Module "pl.file"

File manipulation functions: reading, writing, moving and copying.

Functions

file.access_time (path) Return the time of last access as the number of seconds since the epoch.
file.copy (src, dest, flag) copy a file.
file.creation_time (path) Return when the file was created.
file.delete (path) Delete a file
file.modified_time (path) Return the time of last modification
file.move (src, dest) move a file.
file.read (filename) return the contents of a file as a string
file.write (filename, str) write a string to a file


Functions

file.access_time (path)
Return the time of last access as the number of seconds since the epoch.

Parameters:

  • path: A file path
file.copy (src, dest, flag)
copy a file.

Parameters:

  • src: source file
  • dest: destination file
  • flag: true if you want to force the copy (default)

Return value:

true if operation succeeded
file.creation_time (path)
Return when the file was created.

Parameters:

  • path: A file path
file.delete (path)
Delete a file

Parameters:

  • path: A file path
file.modified_time (path)
Return the time of last modification

Parameters:

  • path: A file path
file.move (src, dest)
move a file.

Parameters:

  • src: source file
  • dest: destination file

Return value:

true if operation succeeded, else false and the reason for the error.
file.read (filename)
return the contents of a file as a string

Parameters:

  • filename: The file path

Return value:

file contents
file.write (filename, str)
write a string to a file

Parameters:

  • filename: The file path
  • str: The string
